casebody.data:
No. 495,

Misc.

Smith v. Hooey, Judge. Joe S. Moss for respondent. Solicitor General Griswold filed a memorandum for the United States by invitation of the Court (390 U. S. 937).

Sup. Ct. Tex. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted and case transferred to appellate docket.
